original_text: And they did eat of the old corn of the land on the morrow after the passover, unleavened cakes, and parched corn in the selfsame day.
korean_text: 유월절 이튿날에 그 땅의 소산물을 먹되 그 날에 무교병과 볶은 곡식을 먹었더라

sentences.original_text: And they did eat of the old corn of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 땅의 묵은 곡식을 먹었으며

sentences.original_text: on the morrow after the passover
